task.title: Configuring independent 2G PRAU and MSRT timers with 3G
task.shortdesc: Use the global parameter pRau2g to enable this feature, and the paramId 48 parameter of the patchParameter command to define the value for 2G PRAU timer.

step.cmd: Enable SGSN support for independent 2G PRAU and MSRT timers with 3G.
Define the new patch parameter for 2G PRAU timer.

info.note: Set the appId parameter to 40A, paramId parameter to 48 and value parameter is in Hex.
